Reviews.Title: Great for a first timer!!!
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a gift for my niece and she loves it! The bundle is awesome. I personally own a dslr but this point and shoot is perfect for a first camera. I rated it a 5 because there's no problems and it comes with so much. I would reccomed this cera to anyone who wants a point and shoot...

Reviews.Title: I like very much
Reviews.Author: SIVANATH MOORTHY
Reviews.Content: Very good pic clarity... its esey to carrey in the travelling time. its recorded my golden memories... Usefull acceries attached with this bundle.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: jw
Reviews.Content: this is a great cramera is small easy to use and looks good too. i bought another one for a friend and she loves it also.

Reviews.Title: Camera for you personal use
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: ideal for take normal pictures on partys o personal reunions or to go outside to the pool the river or the beach perfect for you records. exelent quality of pictures and video and the combo is just amazing all the pack come in perfect state just ideal for a begginer photographer or just to take personal pictures

ProductInfo.Features:
20.1-MP CCD sensor for bright, sharp photos and HD videos
720p HD videos with sound bring your memories to life
Vibration Reduction helps keep the shot steady, even if your hands are not
7x optical zoom NIKKOR glass lens
Easily match your situation to one of 20 Scene Modes like Beach, Snow, Night Portrait, Sunset and more, and enjoy effortless great shots. Or, choose Scene Auto Selector and let the camera choose for you.
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX S3500 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB SDHC + Camera Case + Card Reader + Replacement EN-EL19 Battery + Spider Tripod + Accessory Kit
